name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Snake Game Offline on Google Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play classic Snake game offline version on your Google Chrome!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Snake Classic Offline Version (Only 1MB)

Play Snake on your Google Chrome Browser. Use your arrow keys to move the snake
Snake is the common name for a video game concept where the player maneuvers a line which grows in length, with the line itself being a primary obstacle.

1. Install extension
2. Click the Snake icon on the Chrome extension toolbar 
and then we will open a Snake for you to play the game! You don’t need to do anything else! You also can play Snake from any Chrome Tab.
Have fun!
